Articles.Content: I have a tourist that want an atmospheric flight on Duna. Would aero-braking in the upper atmosphere qualify, or do I need to go lower? Does it have to be sub-orbital?
I believe it's apoapsis below atmosphere boundary. Aerobraking will only count as sub-orbital.
I thought you had to go orbital before getting to sub-orbital. I though aero-braking, if it didn't count as atmospheric, would only count as fly-by.
